comments:
Overview Description:  

    The device server issued the following error messages when invoking Topology & AttributePEOnly scanners during Aperi fabric agent starting up time
2006.11.09 11:20:06.767-08:00 BTAQE1107E InbandScanHandler failed to start InbandScanner Topology on managed   host 9.43.237.27:9570.   org.eclipse.aperi.discovery.tsanm.InbandScanner run
2006.11.09 11:20:06.783-08:00 java.lang.RuntimeException: Handshake generated a fault.
	at org.eclipse.aperi.sanmgmt.middleware.data.SoapClient.handshake(SoapClient.java:300)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.sanmgmt.middleware.data.SoapClient.init(SoapClient.java:109)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.sanmgmt.middleware.data.SoapServiceProxy.invoke(SoapServiceProxy.java:50)
	at $Proxy7.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.discovery.tsanm.InbandScanner.run(InbandScanner.java:134)   org.eclipse.aperi.discovery.tsanm.InbandScanner run
2006.11.09 11:20:06.846-08:00 BTAQE1107E InbandScanHandler failed to start InbandScanner AttributePEOnly on managed   host 9.43.237.27:9570.   org.eclipse.aperi.discovery.tsanm.InbandScanner run
2006.11.09 11:20:06.846-08:00 java.lang.RuntimeException: Handshake generated a fault.
	at org.eclipse.aperi.sanmgmt.middleware.data.SoapClient.handshake(SoapClient.java:300)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.sanmgmt.middleware.data.SoapClient.init(SoapClient.java:109)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.sanmgmt.middleware.data.SoapServiceProxy.invoke(SoapServiceProxy.java:50)
	at $Proxy7.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.aperi.discovery.tsanm.InbandScanner.run(InbandScanner.java:134)   org.eclipse.aperi.discovery.tsanm.InbandScanner run


Steps to Reproduce:  

      Starting Aperi with device server and fabric agent installed

Actual Results:  

      The fabric agent started without error but Topology & AttributePEOnly scanners would not run automatically. 

Expected Results:  

      The fabric agent starts and Topology & AttributePEOnly scanners will run automatically. 

Build Date & Platform:  

    Build Aperi-20061121-1100.zip & windows platform

The activator for the fabric agent did not provide a dictionary to be registered along with the services for IScanner, IChangeAgent, IHostQuery.
Thus the connector was not able to retrieve these services.
This has been fixed.
